content:
That is the unread messages not the total.

I do not think there is an option to disable display of the number of unread messages in a folder.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: try clicking the heading that says date. click it again to reverse the order.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Hi everyone, I am using Thunderbird 115 with the IMAP protocol to receive emails. I found that my Thunderbird profile folder is very large at 565GB, but my email occupies only 40GB on the server. I checked the contents of my configuration folder and found many files named nstmp-1 nstmp-2 etc, dozens of them, which are taking up a lot of my hard disk space. I want to know what these nstmp files are for, can I delete them, and what impact will deleting them have on my emails? Thank you all.
creator: hsy906

content:
Questo è il link diretto alla versione che hai indicato (Thunderbird 128.10.2esr a 64 bit): https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/128.10.2esr/win64/it/Thunderbird%20Setup%20128.10.2esr.exe

edit: probabilmente hai qualche configurazione particolare nel browser o sbagli qualcosa, la donazione è facoltativa e non blocca il download di Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content:
Salve, ho scaricato Thunderbird 128.10.2esr a 64 bit dal link che mi avete inviato: tutto OK. Grazie per il link e per la prontezza della risposta.

Uso il browser Chrome, avete qualche suggerimento su quale configurazione correggere per risolvere il problema?
creator: nfulterxy

content: Dat is binnen Thunderbird in principe niet mogelijk tenzij de computer continue ingeschakeld blijft. Vaak is het wel mogelijk om bij de provider e-mailregels in te stellen voor het verwerken van e-mailberichten. Kijk daarvoor in de webmailversie van de account.
creator: Mozilla-assistent
